Package com.j2igf.framework.graphics

Class Renderer

java.lang.Object
com.j2igf.framework.graphics.Renderer
public final class Renderer extends Object
This class is used to render graphics on the target buffer.
Author:
Aryan Rai

  • Constructor Details

    • Renderer

      public Renderer(Window window)
      This is a constructor for the Renderer class. It sets the target buffer to the frame buffer of the window.
      Parameters:
      window - instance of the Window for the frame buffer and dimensions

    • Renderer

      public Renderer(Sprite target)
      This is a constructor for the Renderer class. It sets the target buffer to the pixels of the Sprite.
      Parameters:
      target - instance of the Sprite which this renderer will target.

  • Method Details

    • setFont

      public void setFont(FontAtlas fontAtlas)
      This method is used to set the font atlas.
      Parameters:
      fontAtlas - instance of the FontAtlas

    • enableAlphaBlending

      public void enableAlphaBlending()
      This method is used to enable alpha blending.

    • disableAlphaBlending

      public void disableAlphaBlending()
      This method is used to disable alpha blending.

    • useGlobalAlpha

      public void useGlobalAlpha(float alpha)
      This method is used to set the global alpha value. And use global alpha instead of per-pixel alpha.
      Parameters:
      alpha - the global alpha value

    • useLocalAlpha

      public void useLocalAlpha()
      This method is used to use per-pixel alpha instead of global alpha.

    • clear

      public void clear(int color)
      This method is used to clear the target buffer to a specific color.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to which the target buffer will be cleared

    • setPixel

      public void setPixel(int x, int y, int color)
      This method is used to draw a pixel on the target buffer.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the pixel
      y - the y coordinate of the pixel
      color - the color of the pixel

    • drawLine

      public void drawLine(int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1, int color)
      This method is used to draw a line on the target buffer.
      Parameters:
      x0 - the x coordinate of the first point
      y0 - the y coordinate of the first point
      x1 - the x coordinate of the second point
      y1 - the y coordinate of the second point
      color - the color of the line

    • drawRect

      public void drawRect(int x, int y, int width, int height, int strokeWidth, int color)
      This method is used to draw a rectangle on the target buffer.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the rectangle
      y - the y coordinate of the rectangle
      width - the width of the rectangle
      height - the height of the rectangle
      strokeWidth - the stroke width of the rectangle
      color - the color of the rectangle

    • fillRect

      public void fillRect(int x, int y, int width, int height, int color)
      This method is used to fill a rectangle on the target buffer.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the rectangle
      y - the y coordinate of the rectangle
      width - the width of the rectangle
      height - the height of the rectangle
      color - the color of the rectangle

    • drawTriangle

      public void drawTriangle(int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int color)
      This method is used to draw a triangle on the target buffer.
      Parameters:
      x0 - the x coordinate of the first point of the triangle
      y0 - the y coordinate of the first point of the triangle
      x1 - the x coordinate of the second point of the triangle
      y1 - the y coordinate of the second point of the triangle
      x2 - the x coordinate of the third point of the triangle
      y2 - the y coordinate of the third point of the triangle
      color - the color of the triangle

      y1 - the y coordinate of the second point of the triangle

      color - the color of the triangle
